title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Per capita consumption in pounds has decreased over the Year
Per capita consumption in pounds is roughly constant from 2000/01 to 2017/18, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2017/18 to 2018/19.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017/18 and 2018/19.
Max Per capita consumption in pounds about 2.59 was recorded at Year 2002/03
Min Per capita consumption in pounds about 1.0 was recorded at Year 2018/19
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 8 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015/16 to 2018/19.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2006/07 to 2009/10.
But, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2013/14 to 2015/16.
But, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2011/12 to 2013/14.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009/10 to 2011/12.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2004/05 to 2006/07.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2002/03 to 2004/05.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2000/01 to 2002/03.
